00096             function                compile_comments( &$Comments )
00097             {
00098                   try
00099                   {
00100                         if( isset( $Comments[ 0 ] ) )
00101                         {
00102                               $CommentLine = '';
00103 
00104                               $TemplatePath = dirname( __FILE__ ).'/res/templates/default_comment_template.tpl';
00105                               
00106                               foreach( $Comments as $i => $Comment )
00107                               {
00108                                     $CommentLine .= $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( $TemplatePath );
00109                                     $CommentLine  = $this->String->print_record( $CommentLine , $Comment );
00110                               }
00111                               
00112                               return( $CommentLine );
00113                         }
00114                         else
00115                         {
00116                               return( '{lang:comments_were_not_found}' );
00117                         }
00118                   }
00119                   catch( Exception $e )
00120                   {
00121                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00122                   }
00123             }

00147             function                get_comments_for_object( &$BlockSettings )
00148             {
00149                   try
00150                   {
00151                         $MasterId = $BlockSettings->get_setting( 'master_id' );
00152                         $MasterType = $BlockSettings->get_setting( 'master_type' );
00153 
00154                         return( $this->CommentAlgorithms->get_records_for_object( $MasterId , $MasterType ) );
00155                   }
00156                   catch( Exception $e )
00157                   {
00158                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );

00188             function                process_comment_link( $ProcessingString , $Changed )
00189             {
00190                   try
00191                   {
00192                         $Limitations = array( 'master_id' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'master_type' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
00193                         for( ; $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( 
00194                                                                                                 $ProcessingString , 'comment_link' , $Limitations ) ; )
00195                         {
00196                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $MacroParameters );
00197                               
00198                               $Page = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'page' );
00199                               $MasterId = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'master_id' );
00200                               $MasterType = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'master_type' );
00201                               $CommentsCount = $this->Link->get_links_count( $MasterId , false , $MasterType , 'comment' );
00202 
00203                               $Code = "<a href=\"./$Page\">{lang:comments} [ $CommentsCount ]</a>";
00204                               
00205                               $ProcessingString = str_replace( "{comment_link:$MacroParameters}" , $Code , $ProcessingString );
00206                               $Changed = true;
00207                         }
00208                         
00209                         return( array( $ProcessingString , $Changed ) );
00210                   }
00211                   catch( Exception $e )
00212                   {
00213                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00214                   }
00215             }

00243             function                process_comment_line( $ProcessingString , $Changed )
00244             {
00245                   try
00246                   {
00247                         $Limitations = array( 'master_id' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'master_type' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
00248                         for( ; $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( 
00249                                                                                                 $ProcessingString , 'comment_line' , $Limitations ) ; )
00250                         {
00251                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $MacroParameters );
00252                               $Comments = $this->get_comments_for_object( $this->BlockSettings );
00253                   
00254                               $Code = $this->compile_comments( $Comments );
00255                               
00256                               $ProcessingString = str_replace( "{comment_line:$MacroParameters}" , $Code , $ProcessingString );
00257                               $Changed = true;
00258                         }
00259                         
00260                         return( array( $ProcessingString , $Changed ) );
00261                   }
00262                   catch( Exception $e )
00263                   {
00264                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00265                   }
00266             }

00294             function                process_comment_form( $ProcessingString , $Changed )
00295             {
00296                   try
00297                   {
00298                         $Limitations = array( 
00299                               'master_id' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'master_type' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'need_run' => TERMINAL_VALUE
00300                         );
00301                         for( ; $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( 
00302                                                                                                 $ProcessingString , 'comment_form' , $Limitations ) ; )
00303                         {
00304                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $MacroParameters );
00305                               
00306                               list( $MasterType , $MasterId )= $this->BlockSettings->get_settings( 'master_type,master_id' );
00307                               $NeedRun = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'need_run' , 1 );
00308 
00309                               $Code = '{direct_controller:package_name=comment::comment_controller;meta=meta_create_comment;'.
00310                                                 "master_type=$MasterType;master_id=$MasterId;direct_create=1;need_run=$NeedRun}".
00311                                           '{direct_view:package_name=comment::comment_view;meta=meta_create_comment_form;'.
00312                                                 "master_type=$MasterType;master_id=$MasterId;direct_create=1;need_run=$NeedRun}";
00313                               
00314                               $ProcessingString = str_replace( "{comment_form:$MacroParameters}" , $Code , $ProcessingString );
00315                               $Changed = true;
00316                         }
00317                         
00318                         return( array( $ProcessingString , $Changed ) );
00319                   }
00320                   catch( Exception $e )
00321                   {
00322                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );

00356             function                process_string( $Options , $ProcessingString , &$Changed )
00357             {
00358                   try
00359                   {
00360                         list( $ProcessingString , $Changed ) = $this->process_comment_link( $ProcessingString , $Changed );

00364                         list( $ProcessingString , $Changed ) = $this->process_comment_form( $ProcessingString , $Changed );
